creator: odelyay@sintecmedia.com
text: SEVERE: The web application [/My] created a ThreadLocal with key of type [org.apache.log4j.helpers.ThreadLocalMap] (value [org.apache.log4j.helpers.ThreadLocalMap@118af1b]) and a value of type [java.util.Hashtable] (value [{}]) but failed to remove it when the web application was stopped. This is very likely to create a memory leak.
